H0.text: Mouse has a higher metabolic rate than an elephant.

H1.text: Rat has a higher metabolic rate than an elephant.

H2.text: Rabbit has a higher metabolic rate compared to a mouse or an elephant.

H3.text: Elephant has a higher metabolic rate than a mouse.

A4.text: mammals with larger body size have longer maximum life spans (large animals do have higher total metabolic rates, but the metabolic rate at the cellular level is much lower, and the breathing rate and heartbeat are slower in larger animals)

A5.text: When upright, the elephant's heart beats around 28 beats per minute and actually speeds up to 35 beats when it lies down.
